pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Implementation of the 'Align-GVGD' Method // 'Align-GVGD' ('A-GVGD') is a method to predict the impact of 'missense' substitutions based on the properties of amino acid side chains and protein multiple sequence alignments doi:10.1136/jmg.2005.033878. 'A-GVGD' is an extension of the original 'Grantham' distance to multiple sequence alignments. This package provides an alternative R implementation to the web version found on http://agvgd.hci.utah.edu/.
